scripts.build:bin: npm rebuild better-sqlite3 --target=18.5.0 --target_arch=arm64 && npm run build:cjs && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); pkg.type='commonjs'; delete pkg.scripts; fs.writeFileSync('dist-cjs/package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));" && cd dist-cjs && pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --out-path ../../frontend/resources/bin && cp ../node_modules/better-sqlite3/build/Release/better_sqlite3.node ../../frontend/resources/bin/
